Data Fields
device_pwm_cfg_t Struct Reference
Device Configuration

Data structure for a PWM device (up to 8 channels) More...

#include <device.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_pwm_cfg_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the data for use with a PWM driven device (such as an H-bridge).

Data Fields

pwm_duty_t top
 The top value of the PWM.
 
uint32_t freq
 The PWM timer frequency; The period is the "top" member divided by "freq".
 
int8_t channels [DEVICE_MAX_PWM_CHANNELS]
 The channels to use (-1) if not used.
